game.name: Stickman Fighter Mega Brawl
game.description:
The brave and courageous ninja character needs your help! He has already participated in an epic battle, but forgot how to fight against his enemies. Would you come forward to give your helping hands to the needy? Join Stickman Fighter Mega Brawl and be prepared to fight like an expert against a horde of Stickmen, deadly warriors and epic Stick Boss! No need to show mercy on these dangerous Stickmen and do your best to exterminate them all from the screen in this brand new action game!

There are plenty of magic spells, special technics, massive weapons, super skills and multiple destructing moves to deal with. Use your intense punches, kicks, and do not forget to unleash your inner ninja skills to send all the stickmen to the hell in this ultimate fighting stickman game! Choose your level and get ready to enjoy the epic battle first time in your life! You would have 40 unique and addictive levels to play with in this HTML5 fighting game.

Your winning is important so apply mega fireballs, devastating weapons, punches, kicks and several other bone-crushing moves to taste the victory in each level. Your objective is to achieve your mission without being killed or injured. Complete level, earn coins and money and do not forget to use them to upgrade your weapons to fight harder against your enemies! No need to download Stickman Fighter Mega Brawl when you connect with atmegame.com! Give it a try now if you are ready for the epic combats or want to show the power of your fists!
